dict.acceptation: 持续；逗留，停留；维持原状；
<美>[法律]延期；使延伸；使持续；继续说；

sent.orig: In case 2, the continue moves back to the beginning of the inner iteration.
sent.trans: 在条件2中，continue移回内部循环的起始处。

sent.orig: The history of the club demands we continue winning and the manager demands we continue winning.
sent.trans: 俱乐部的历史需要我们继续获胜，经理要求我们继续获胜。

sent.orig: I shall continue as chairman for the present, and continue to make all executive decisions.
sent.trans: 目前我应继续做主席，做出行政决定。

sent.orig: Keep a quiet heart, you can continue to beyond, continue to self-challenge.
sent.trans: 守住一颗宁静的心，你便可以不断超越，不断向自我挑战。

sent.orig: How can you continue to work/continue working with all that noise going on?
sent.trans: 你在那不停的噪声中怎麽能工作得下去呀？
